Turn Off Red Flash from Opponents (A+Upward=Flash Off,A+Downward=Normal) [g6flavor]
283A50A2 00000802
04099AF8 60000000
E0000000 80008000
283A50A2 00000801
04099AF8 901D0218
E0000000 80008000

* Round 1 only

** All button codes are done on a Wii Remote only (side way)

Time Codes:

Slow down timer to match Actual time speed [g6flavor]

283C6DE2 000038D4
48000000 8039D420
DE000000 80008180
58010000 0000248C
30000198 3F800000

E0000000 80008000

Profile 1 Codes:

Unlock Headgear (push B+1) [g6flavor]
283A50A2 00000600
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
10000EE7 00000001
E0000000 80008000

Reset Last Stand Chances (push A+1) [g6flavor]
283A50A2 00000A00
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
100002B3 00000003
E0000000 80008000

Enable Champions Mode [g6flavor]
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
10000E5F 00000001
E0000000 80008000

48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180

E0000000 80008000

E0000000 80008000

Enable Champions Mode [g6flavor]
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
10001AA7 00000001
E0000000 80008000

* Might affect 2 rounds in a roll
